name: Spirit Arena - Free Early Access
description:
Disclaimer : This game is still in EARLY-ACCESS, it'll be realease on 18th September

Spirit Arena : The Game

As two sorcerers try to summon and tame powerful monsters from a secret realm, their experiment fails and leads waves of demons into our world. Strengthening their will, they decide to face this great threat and defeat the calamities that are now running free!

Gameplay

Spirit Arena is a local two-player game. Each character can fire either physical spells (red) or spiritual spells (blue) that will only collide with matching enemy. Clean waves, collect items, and increase your power to defeat the boss of all four areas.

We need you !

As a demo game, we need your advise and your feeling about your experience as a player, so take part of the adventure by filling this form here. 

Thank you for everything, and if you have something specific to say to the team, you'll be welcome on our discord channel, and don't forget to add it to your wishlist on Steam!
